abstract: Prosecutors are looking into whether “there’s a UBS-style situation of a bank actively marketing” tax evasion services, said a person briefed on the proceedings.
snippet: Prosecutors are looking into whether “there’s a UBS-style situation of a bank actively marketing” tax evasion services, said a person briefed on the proceedings.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors are ramping up their criminal investigation into HSBC concerning its sale of offshore tax services to wealthy Americans suspected of evading taxes, according to two people briefed on the matter and to court papers.

headline.main: U.S. Widens Tax Inquiry Into HSBC
headline.print_headline: U.S. Widens Tax Inquiry Into HSBC
